author: Vertyco
description: Send emails through your Gmail account. Configure multiple accounts, set signatures, configure allowed roles to send.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores email addresses and app passwords in order to send emails!
install_msg: Thank you for installing! Type `[p]gmailhelp` to get started! (This cog is in Beta, please report any bugs to Vertyco on Discord!)
short: Send emails through your Gmail account!
